a:4:{s:5:"value";O:8:"stdClass":18:{s:5:"title";s:30:"Regular fit cotton khadi shirt";s:11:"description";s:1598:"<p>Multicolor striped regular fit cotton khadi shirt from Khadi Nation, stitched from handspun and handwoven khadi fabric woven by the weavers of rural Karnataka. This classic khadi shirt is designed with short sleeves and matching red buttons for fastening in the front. The fabric of this shirt has multicolored single yarn vertical stripes giving an overall red shade to this shirt with exquisite texture on the surface. The speciality of this khadi shirt is in the nature of its khadi cotton material which softens after every wash, rendering it more comfortable with each wear. Khadi nation offers quality khadi products manufactured by their skilled artisans through the interlacement of charkha spun yarns on a handloom, designed in classic vibrant colors. The authenticity of these khadi products is certified by the KVIC (Khadi Village Industries Commission) Government of India.&nbsp;</p><p>Size: 38;&nbsp;</p><p>Sleeve: Half Sleeve;&nbsp;</p><p>Pockets: 1 chest pocket;&nbsp;</p><p>Collar: Formal;&nbsp;</p><p>Fastening: Buttons;&nbsp;</p><p>Material: Khadi Cotton;&nbsp;</p><p>Color hues may slightly vary from that which appears in the image.&nbsp;</p><p>Slight shrinkage to be expected after the first wash of this starched fabric</p><p>Special Instructions :</p><p>• Suggested dry cleaning&nbsp;</p><p>• Wash dark and light colors separately&nbsp;</p><p>• Do not squeeze or wring&nbsp;</p><p>• Store in clean and dry place, away from insects, dust, excessive light &amp; moisture&nbsp;</p><p>• For every khadi product, let the first wash be in salt
